metadata.dc:author: Alom Poveda, J
Espinosa Martínez, J
Pérez Arroyo, M
Monge Argiles, J A
Roca Estelles, M J
metadata.dc:description: We present a patient with slowly progressing optic atrophy, sensorineural deafness and sensory neuropathy. Clinical examination and testing revealed the exclusively sensorineural nature of this syndrome. Nerve biopsy pointed to primary degeneration. Our review of the literature indicates that this syndrome is categorized as heredo-degenerative.
metadata.dc:title: Atrofia óptica, sordera neurosensorial y neuropatía sensitiva.
[Optic atrophy, sensorineural deafness and sensory neuropathy].
